SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bishop
Represents a Bishop piece in a chess game.
Chess
The Chess class represents a chess game GUI.
ChessBoard
Represents a chessboard for managing piece positions and performing validity checks.
Column
Enumerations for the board columns.
EnumColor
Enumerations for the player colors
Figure
Represents a chess figure with a name, color, and position on the board.
IntBishop
Interface representing the behavior of a Bishop piece in a chess game.
IntChessBoard
An interface representing a chessboard for managing positions and validity checks.
IntFigure
The IntFigure interface represents a figure that can move to a new position on a grid.
King
Represents a king figure in the chess game.
Knight
Represents a knight chess piece with a name, color, and position on the board.
Pawn
Represents a pawn figure in the chess game.
PieceType
Enumerations for the chess pieces.
Queen
Represents a Queen piece in a chess game, inheriting behavior from Rook and implementing behavior from IntBishop.
Rook
The Rook class represents a rook chess piece.
